Headquarters Regions: Greater Los Angeles Area, West Coast, Western US
Name: TikTok
short description: TikTok is a short-video sharing app and social network platform.
Brief_description: TikTok is a short-video sharing app and social network platform. Their mission is to capture and present the world's creativity, knowledge, and precious life moments, directly from the mobile phone. TikTok enables everyone to be a creator, and encourages users to share their passion and creative expression through their videos.
